New Records: Dejounte Murray recorded a triple-double with 10 rebounds, 12 assists, and 25 points
Key Match Events: New Orleans Pelicans led from the first quarter to the final
Game was a blowout with a significant margin
Pre-Game Insights: New Orleans Pelicans were 7-29 overall and 2-15 on the road
Washington Wizards were 6-27 overall and 5-14 at home
Post-Match Reflections: New Orleans Pelicans secured their second win in a row
CJ McCollum's performance was a key factor in the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was held at Capital One Arena in Washington, DC
Referees included Matt Boland, James Williams, and Nate Green
